name: The Helpful Cloud
description:
Day 1 of... existing! I guess you're floating here now. Wherever here is. This crisp air feels good. And it's camping season! What's "camping" anyway? You don't know but these things on the ground seem to appreciate when you use your powers! Sometimes... other times they don't seem so happy. Being helpful feels good, but be careful! You'll quickly learn that you're not so helpful all of the time.

ARROW KEYS - movement

Z - discharge fury

X - sprinkle cloudstuffs

Thank you freesounds.org for sound effects.

Carefree Melody by Twin Musicom is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/...)

Developers: Warren Liang , Wesley Bower

Artists: Qiling Ma, Nicole Yuen

Producer: Qiling Ma

Designers: Warren Liang, Wesley Bower, Nicole Yuen
